title: Matchbox Holder, 1907
markings: Three-triangle mark on lower portion of closed end; "L & Co." and three marks for Birmingham, sterling and  the date letter h for 1907
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
description: Rectangular with top and bottom closed, one end open and other three sides mostly open; enameled in green and blue; motif applied at the center of the top of holder.

tombstone.epitaph: Matchbox Holder, 1907.Silver, enamel. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-27.
